it.polimi.se2018.server.network

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.server.network.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Server: the class represents the Server, responsible for handling and manage the user connection, it's the class responsible for the creation of the controller and the handling of the timer at the start of the gameController
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server()
      Class constructor: load from a settings file the socket and rmi port for the user connection and the timer of the login it's responsible for the creation of the socket and rmi gatherer that handle the connection

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRmiClient(RmiClientInterface clientRmi, RmiServerImpl rmiServer)
      synchronized method that create a virtual rmi and add it to the list of the rmi clients connected to the server
      void addSocketClient(VirtualSocket virtualSocket)
      synchronized method that add a new virtual socket to the list of the socket clients connected to the server
      boolean checkNumberPlayer()
      method helper the check if the number of players have reached the maximum
      void endGame()
      method that eliminate the clients and the controller instance at the end of a match and when no player remain connected to the server
      void endTimerLogin()
      method that stop the login timer if there's an instance created yet
      java.util.List<VirtualView> getClients()
      synchronized method that provide the caller of the current list of clients connected to the server
      GameController getGameController()
      method that provide the caller of the current gameController controller

      method that provide the caller of the available id to set to the player

      method that provide the caller of the current number of player in the multiplayer mode gameController

      method that provide the caller of the rmi gatherer

      method that provide the caller of the state of started game at the moment of the call
      boolean isSinglePlayer() 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      method main that start a new Server instance
      void removeClient(VirtualView virtualView)
      synchronized method that remove a virtual view from the list of the clients connected to the server if the server contains it
      void removeSocketClient(VirtualSocket virtualSocket)
      synchronized method that remove a virtual socket from the list of the socket clients connected to the server
      void setGameController(GameController gameController)
      method that allow the caller to set the controller of a match
      private void setGameStarted(boolean gameStarted)
      method that allow the caller to set the gameController state to started or not
      static void setIdPlayer(int idPlayer)
      method that allow the caller to set the next id available to assign to a player
      static void setMulti(int multi)
      method that allow the caller to set the current number player in the multi player gameController mode
      static void setSinglePlayer(boolean singlePlayer)
      method that allow the caller to set if the modality of the gameController is single player or not
      void waitingOtherPlayers()
      synchronized method responsible for the waiting of the connections of the other players, if the player are greater than or equal to 2 start a timer for waiting other players to connect, at the end of the timer create e new instance of the controller and set the gameController started to true,while if the gameController mode is single player jump the timer and directly start a new gameController.

        synchronized method that remove a virtual view from the list of the clients connected to the server if the server contains it
        Parameters:
        virtualView - to remove from the clients

      • waitingOtherPlayers

        public void waitingOtherPlayers()
        synchronized method responsible for the waiting of the connections of the other players, if the player are greater than or equal to 2 start a timer for waiting other players to connect, at the end of the timer create e new instance of the controller and set the gameController started to true,while if the gameController mode is single player jump the timer and directly start a new gameController. It immediately start a gameController if the players connected are 4

      • checkNumberPlayer

        public boolean checkNumberPlayer()
        method helper the check if the number of players have reached the maximum
        Returns:
        boolean of (un)successful check

      • endTimerLogin

        public void endTimerLogin()
        method that stop the login timer if there's an instance created yet

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        method that eliminate the clients and the controller instance at the end of a match and when no player remain connected to the server
